amendment.description: An amendment numbered 65 printed in House Report 115-830 to prevent federal funds from being used to implement the State of California's Bay-Delta Plan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A059) offered by Mr. Denham.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
